page.title: 18FAVOURITE MEALS.
page.content: {Breakfast.}Toast,Bread roll with jam on,Rice Crispies,2 Weetabix with a spoonful of sugar on each one, Frosties,cup of tea or coffee{ {Main Course.}Chicken,roast potatoes, stuffing,cauliflower,and peas.Boiled potatoes,roast potatoes and lamb. Chips,sausages,waffles and beefburgers.Beans and chips.Chicken,chips,stuffing and tomato sauce.Chips ,sausage and beans with plenty of salt and vinegar.Roast potatoes,turkey roll,beans and cabbage. {Pudding.}Ice-cream with a chocolate flake and a peach.Chocolate biscuits. Jelly.A Kit-Kat biscuit. {Tea.}Salad.Chips,biscuits and a Curly Wurly bar.A piece of cake.Sandwiches and crisps.
